Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
  • class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the executable class for the server-side of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the server-side process asking for some parameters and then starts the server manager. and connection technology (socket or rmi).
        Parameters:
        args - are command line inputs

      • manageIntInput

        private static int manageIntInput​(java.util.Scanner stdin,
                                  int minValue,
                                  int maxValue,
                                  int forbiddenValue)
        Manages the insertion of an integer on command line input, asking it again until it not a valid value.
        Parameters:
        stdin - is the input scanner
        minValue - is the minimum acceptable value of the input
        maxValue - is the maximum acceptable value of the input
        forbiddenValue - is a forbidden value of the input
        Returns:
        the value of the input
